ast (Discover the fate of the Githyanki egg.) Urban Jungle (Survive the Bhaalist ambush at the park.) Children of an Outlander (Convince Jaheira to let her family stay in the city.) Down to the Depths Below (Enter the Iron Throne.) Catastrophic Structural Failure (Blow up the Steel Watch Foundry.) Horizon Walker (Travel through the House of Hope portal.) The Face of Evil (Reach the Temple of Bhaal.)
